title: Basic html text input test
description: A basic html text input test.

chrome.output: "your favorite animal? Edit, cats, type in text"
in list of form controls as "your favorite animal? edit cats"

edge.output: "your favorite animal? Edit, cats, type in text"
in list of form controls as "your favorite animal? edit cats"

ie.output: "Edit, cats, your favorite animal, edit, cats, type in text"

results.notes: announced the name when entering the input and automatically switching to forms mode.

in list of form controls as "your favorite animal? edit cats"

results.notes: announced the name when entering the input and automatically switching to forms mode.

"your favorite animal? edit, cats, cats selected."

chrome.output: in list of form controls as "your favorite animal; edit; cats"

edge.output: in list of form controls as "your favorite animal; edit; cats"

"your favorite animal? Edit has auto complete. selected, cats."

"your favorite animal? Edit, has auto complete. Cats."

and_chr.output: "cats, edit box, your favorite animal? double tap to enter text"
"cats, edit box, your favorite animal? end of field"
role is flagged with a number

"your favorite animal? Cats, text field, double tap to edit"

"Cats, contents selected, your favorite animal?, edit text"
in list of form controls as "cats Your favorite animal? edit text"

results.notes: not consistent with the usual role announcement
